HeadComp.title: MSG91 - Our team, culture and happy clients.
HeadComp.description: Empowering developers with communication APIs. Building modern communication tools and supporting ideas for startups and enterprises globally.

CompareBannerComp.heading: MSG91 vs Interakt
CompareBannerComp.subheading: MSG91 and Interakt both provide WhatsApp Business API solutions for customer communication and engagement. However, MSG91 offers a more comprehensive suite with AI-powered automation, seamless integrations, and advanced customer journey creation tools, making it ideal for businesses seeking an all-in-one communication platform.

content.name: Interakt
content.des: Interakt specializes in WhatsApp Business API solutions tailored for SMEs, offering basic automation and CRM features. However, it lacks multi-channel capabilities and deep customization required for large-scale operations.

content.name: MSG91
content.des: MSG91, on the other hand, is an all-in-one communication platform that not only provides WhatsApp Business API with advanced automation but also enables businesses to create customer journeys, segment users, and integrate seamlessly with multiple platforms. With competitive pricing, premium support, and a strong focus on scalability, MSG91 is the superior choice for businesses looking to maximize customer engagement.

features.whatsapp_payments: Yes payment solution available only for Indian businesses
features.payment_links: Yes payment support available only for Indian businesses
features.otp_widget: Yes OTP verification through WhatsApp Business API
features.one_click_verification: Authentication templates include option autofill OTP or copy OTP code
features.unified_platform: One platform for WhatsApp automation, WhatsApp API, connect with Google Ads and add WhatsApp button on any website to increase conversion
features.technical_knowledge_required: Requires technical knowledge for integrating API

PreFooterComp.content: Start building your ideal customer engagement experience
